      • showFileChooser

        public static java.lang.String showFileChooser(java.awt.Component parent,
                               int type,
                               javax.swing.filechooser.FileNameExtensionFilter filter,
                               java.io.File selectedFile)
        Show open/close file dialog.
        Parameters:
        parent - Parent component
        type - Type of the dialog
        • JFileChooser.OPEN_DIALOG for Open dialog
        • JFileChooser.SAVE_DIALOG for Save dialog
        filter - File name/extension filter
        selectedFile - Pre-selected file
        Returns:
        Absolute path of the selected file if a file was selected; null otherwise
